doctor.name: Asso. Prof. Dr. Amreen Faruq
doctor.specialty: General, Laparoscopic, Breast, Hernia & Diabetic Foot Surgeon
doctor.workplace: Birdem General Hospital & Ibrahim Medical College
doctor.info: Asso. Prof. Dr. Amreen Faruq is a highly skilled General, Laparoscopic, Breast, Hernia, and Diabetic Foot Surgeon in Dhaka, with expertise in a broad range of surgical procedures including minimally invasive laparoscopic surgeries, breast surgeries, hernia repairs, and diabetic foot management. She holds an MBBS, MS (Surgery), and the distinguished FACS (USA) fellowship, reflecting her international standard of surgical training and patient care. Currently, she is serving as Associate Professor of Surgery at Birdem General Hospital & Ibrahim Medical College, where she is widely respected for her surgical precision and patient-centered approach. Dr. Amreen Faruq provides consultations at the BIRDEM Specialized Chamber Complex, Shahbag, Dhaka, with visiting hours from 2pm to 5pm (Closed: Thursday & Friday), offering comprehensive surgical solutions with a special focus on diabetic and endocrine-related surgical conditions.
